alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:16AM EST until January 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a glaze of ice. * WHERE...Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS..Precipitation will begin as snow this afternoon, then a period of a sleet/freezing rain mix is expected in the evening. The wintry mix changes to all snow late tonight. Localized snow totals of up to 3 inches are possible across the highest elevations in the Pocono Plateau.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
